attributes.action: Give predicted grades if exams are cancelled instead of doing them in the summer
attributes.additional_details: We would have had less time to revise.
attributes.background: If exams are cancelled, Give students their predicted grades instead of completing GCSE’S ifin the summer.

rejection.details:
Decisions about exams are a matter for exam boards and individual schools, and are not a matter for the UK Government or Parliament.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
